Jeff is Great!http://edition.cnn.com/2014/07/27/world/africa/boko-haram-wife-cameroonian-official/index.htmlhttp://edition.cnn.com/2014/07/27/world/africa/boko-haram-wife-cameroonian-official/index.html?eref=editionGunmen suspected to be Boko Haram Islamists on Sunday abducted the wife of the Cameroonian deputy prime minister in a dawn attack on his home village of Kolofata, north of the area where they also kidnapped a local chief and his family, residents and security sources said. Sun, 27 Jul 2014 23:47:47 EDT
People power in the PRChttp://edition.cnn.com/2014/06/26/world/asia/china-civil-society/index.htmlhttp://edition.cnn.com/2014/06/26/world/asia/china-civil-society/index.html?eref=editionHe saw it first-hand on a reporting trip in Guizhou province -- scores of village children going to school hungry.Fri, 27 Jun 2014 04:32:39 EDT
